metadata.title: EVOS Oil Tracking Segments

creators.name: Alaska Department of Environmental Conservation, Exxon Valdez Oil Spill Restoration Office

metadata.description: Data Type: Exxon Valdez Oil Spill;  This data set was used to track oiling conditions (how much on the beach, condition of oil, depth of oil, was survey performed before or after treatment, etc.) at the end of 1990, August Shoreline assessment.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Unknown

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: Data is to be shared among public agencies and the public, although allowances are made for confidentiality prior to publication of findings.

Use constraints: Beach segment/subdivision numbering system has been modified over the course of data collection. Knowledge of this system is necessary for accurate interpretation of this data.

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system.
